body.p: The optional SPD/TVSS incorporates a remote signaling dry contact and visual status indicators. The Input Section has a viewing panel for the SPD status lights.

The SPD (LEA SP100 or SP200) has a dry contact that is closed when the SPD is powered and functional. (See .) For dry contact wiring information, see the cut sheet for the specific SPD you are using. The correct cut sheet should be included in your submittal package. SPD/TVSS Status Lights
